name: Siter.io
title: siter.io
shortDescription: Siter.io is a no-code website builder designed for individuals and teams who want to create websites quickly without coding. Users can design, launch, and share websites with ease, utilizing features like a freehand editor and Figma plugin. It's ideal for creating portfolios, landing pages, and more.
pros: Integration with Figma for design import
cons: Limited customization compared to traditional coding
May not handle complex backend tasks
Dependent on third-party services for some features
